# Aryan Panwar
> Final-year ECE student at MIET Meerut with hands-on experience in embedded systems, industrial instrumentation, and IoT automation. Building intelligent hardware and software products.

## About
Aryan Panwar is an Embedded Systems Engineer & Agentic AI Developer. He specializes in bridging hardware logic with modern AI capabilities, particularly LLM orchestration and Agentic AI workflows.

Projects:
- FitWardrobe: AI-powered capsule wardrobe mobile app
- Mithivoices: AI voice conversational bot platform
- SEO & GEO Optimizer Skill: Universal AI skill for search optimization
